philosophy.title:
Listen to Your Body.
We Offer Silence.
philosophy.text1: Santis Club unites traditional hammam rituals and modern spa therapies with a unique understanding. Here, time slows down, the body rests, the mind clears.
philosophy.text2: Every ritual is a journey of well-being crafted with the wisdom of centuries. Silence is not a luxury here — it is a way of life.

testimonials.title: Echoes of Serenity
testimonials.t1: The most peaceful 2 hours of my life at Santis. The Ottoman Hammam ritual was a unique experience.
testimonials.t2: After the aromatherapy massage, my body felt reborn. The staff was extremely professional.
testimonials.t3: The Sothys skincare session was magnificent. My skin has never been so radiant and healthy.

faq.q: How long does a massage session last?
faq.a: Our massage sessions last between 30 and 90 minutes. Duration depends on the chosen therapy.

faq.q: What should I do before the massage?
faq.a: We recommend not having a heavy meal one hour before and drinking plenty of water. Please arrive 15 minutes early.

faq.q: Which type of massage is right for me?
faq.a: Our therapists assess your needs during the initial consultation and recommend the most suitable massage.
